title: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to sync a .java file and another resource in the package viewer, an issue occurs.
OB: The bug report does not provide any information about the observed behavior.
EB: The action of syncing a .java file and another resource should complete successfully without any errors or issues.
SR:
1. Open the package viewer
2. Select a .java file
3. Select another resource (e.g., a .properties file)
4. Attempt to sync the files
